text: ī yud'dhamutal avarkku śēṣaṁ vannettiyavarkkumuḷḷatāṇ. avar iṅṅane prārthikkunnavarāṇ: "ñaṅṅaḷuṭe nāthā, nī ñaṅṅaḷkkuṁ ñaṅṅaḷuṭe mumpe satyaviśvāsaṁ svīkaricca ñaṅṅaḷuṭe sahēādaraṅṅaḷkkuṁ peāṟuttutarēṇamē! ñaṅṅaḷuṭe manas'sukaḷil viśvāsikaḷēāṭ oṭṭuṁ veṟupp uṇṭākkarutē. ñaṅṅaḷuṭe nāthā! uṟappāyuṁ nī dayāparanuṁ paramakāruṇikanumallēā.”
